name: Alien Blaster 9000
description:
Welcome to my page! Alien Blaster is a game I made in my free time. I hope you enjoy the game!

ON THE INTERNET AT alexstuff.tk/alienblaster

Controls

WASD-Move

Arrow Keys-Move

Left Click-Shoot

Space-Shoot

Move Mouse-Turn Character

Credits

Textures- Ashley from Scirra: https://www.scirra.com/users/ashley

Base Engine- Construct 2: https://www.scirra.com/construct2

Programming- Qyboz (me)

Help: https://www.scirra.com/tutorials/37/beginners-guide-to-construct-2
